title: Multi-Spatial Learning Situation Orchestration: Augmented Reality and Learning Design Automation Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: A course for novice professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to engage in multi-space learning environments for mathematical problem-solving, performing augmented reality-based activities across classrooms and digital spaces.

learning_goals: Learners can solve mathematical modeling problems in augmented reality environments with 80% accuracy.
Using automated learning design tools, learners can independently plan learning activities across three or more spaces.
Through project-based assessments, learners can propose mathematical problem-solving solutions applicable to real-world professional scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
